name: •  Today the strange feelings of the other week seem very ridiculous to me: they no longer convince me.  •
description: God does not exist, the world becomes absurd and man has no reason to exist either. It only comes to that irrational need/foolishness to believe in imaginary beings. How can we distinguish right from wrong in a world with such different perspectives? Perhaps being human and having a uniquely individual life experience will never allow us to have a final definition of what it means to be a fucking hero.
